content: Singaporean actor (1973–2023) **Timothy Nga** (10 June 1973 – 9 January 2023) was a Singaporean actor. Nga began his professional career in 2003 and performed with several local companies, including [The Necessary Stage](/wiki/The_Necessary_Stage), the [Singapore Repertory Theatre](/wiki/Singapore_Repertory_Theatre) (SRT), and [Wild Rice](/wiki/W!LD_RICE). ## Acting credits ### Theatre YearTitleRole2007*[Everything but the Brain](/wiki/Everything_but_the_Brain)*Doctor*[Lord of the Flies](/wiki/Lord_of_the_Flies)*Bill2009*[The Jungle Book](/wiki/The_Jungle_Book)*2011*A Note Went Off In My Head*2012*A Language of Their Own*2017*Frago*2019*Caught*Lin Bo ### Film YearTitleRole2006*The High Cost of Living*Long*[S11](/wiki/S11_(film))*Terence2019*[Wet Season](/wiki/Wet_Season_(film))* ### Television YearTitleRole2005*[A New Life](/wiki/A_New_Life_(Singaporean_TV_series))*Michael2005–2007*Lifeline*LTA Szeto K.T.2008*[First Class](/wiki/First_Class_(TV_series))*2009*[Fighting Spiders](/wiki/Fighting_Spiders)*2011–2013*Zero Hero*Lenny Wong/Mister Hero2021*The Land is Mine*Guan Meng - Timothy Nga at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article about a Singaporean actor is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Timothy Nga
